casebody.data:
William CHANADY, Appellant, v. DETROIT SHEET METAL WORKS, a Michigan Corporation, Appellee. No. 10285. Circuit Court of Appeals, Sixth Circuit. Dec. 5, 1946. Writ of Certiorari Denied April 7, 1947. Davidson & Beauchamp, of Detroit, Mich., for appellant. Humphreys Springstun, of Detroit, Mich., for appellee.

Before SIMONS, MARTIN, and MILLER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

This action having been heard upon the record, oral arguments of counsel and briefs of the respective parties; and it appearing that the findings of fact of the-District Judge, 64 F.Supp. 580, are fully supported by the evidence and are not clearly erroneous, and that his conclusions, of law are correct; it is ordered that the judgment of the District Court be and is. hereby affirmed.
